column1: A Home going service will be held Saturday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 a.m. at Galilee Missionary Baptist Church in Caldwell with Rev. Wesley Hodges officiating
column4: burial will follow in the Shiloh Baptist Church Cemetery near Caldwell. Military Honors will be provided by Ft. Hood. The family will receive guests from 5:00 to 7:00 p.m. Friday evening at the funeral home.
